question:
Which of the following schemes is/are being subsumed under the Ayushman Bharat-National Health Protection Mission (AB-NHPM)?
  1. Rashtriya Swasthya Bima Yojana (RSBY)
  2. Senior Citizen Health Insurance Scheme
  3. Rashtriya Bal Swasthya Karyakram (RBSK)
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: The Ayushman Bharat -National Health Protection Mission (AB-NHPM) scheme is going to subsume the ongoing centrally sponsored schemes- Rashtriya Swasthya Bima Yojana (RSBY) and Senior Citizen Health Insurance Scheme. Rashtriya Bal Swasthya Karyakram (RBSK) is not included under the AB-NHPM. Rashtriya Bal Swasthya Karyakram (RBSK) aims at early identification and early intervention for treatment of children (0-18 years) suffering from diseases or deficiencies. The proposed AB-NHPM is more than 10 crore families, who will be allowed to take cashless benefits from any Public/Private empanelled hospitals.
